name: Deadly Dozen
description: Infiltrate German occupied territory with your squad of military misfits. Destroy, steal, and kidnap your way out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
